title: "2 - Test-Train-Split"
---

```{r}
# read in the cleaned data
crypto_data = read_csv("/Users/ArpanBagui/Documents/UPenn/Classes/stat-471-final/Data/clean/crypto_data_clean.csv")

# split into train and test (set seed here if applicable)
test_coins = c("bitcoin", "algorand")
crypto_train = crypto_data %>% filter(!(coin_name %in% test_coins))
crypto_test = crypto_data %>% filter(coin_name %in% test_coins)

# save the train and test data
write_csv(x = crypto_train, file = "../Data/clean/crypto_train.csv")

write_csv(x = crypto_test, file = "../Data/clean/crypto_test.csv")
```
